sentences.en: A spherical earth is not hard to accept.
sentences.cn: 地球具有球形不难接受.

sentences.en: Aggregates are compact and close to spherical in shape.
sentences.cn: 聚集体结构紧密并且形状接近于球形.

sentences.en: Attachment systems can sometimes be heavier for a spherical motor than for a cylindrical one.
sentences.cn: 球形发动机的连接系统有时要比圆柱形发动机的重些.

sentences.en: Both spherical and regular crystalline forms are relatively rare.
sentences.cn: 球形的和规则的球晶形成相对来说很稀少.

sentences.en: Haze water drops would be spherical.
sentences.cn: 被称为霾的水滴是球形的.

sentences.en: In a spherical nucleus, the coupling term implies an interweaving of the quadrupole and dipole motion.
sentences.cn: 对球形核中的耦合项意味着四级运动和偶极运动间的交织.

sentences.en: Many engineers shy away from spherical projection methods.
sentences.cn: 许多工程师对球面投影法有畏难情绪.

sentences.en: Most viruses are spherical or roughly spherical.
sentences.cn: 多数病毒呈圆形或近似圆形.

sentences.en: Natural sediment particles are not spherical.
sentences.cn: 天然泥沙颗粒不是球状的.

sentences.en: The angular part of a continuum wave function is, of course, a spherical harmonic.
sentences.cn: 连续谱波函数的角度部分当然是球谐函数.

sentences.en: The result is that the constant - energy surfaces are distorted from the spherical shape.
sentences.cn: 结果,等能面不再是球形,而是扭曲的.

sentences.en: This is evident from the spherical model when the two points are diametrically opposite.
sentences.cn: 在球面模型中当两个点在直径相对两端时这是很明显的.

sentences.en: We begin by considering a spherical element in an unstressed body.
sentences.cn: 现在从考察一无应力物体中的圆球形单元体开始讨论.

sentences.en: We carry out a transformation to spherical polar coordinates.

words.tran_cn: 包围；放入球内；使…成球形

phrases.tran_cn: 球面轴承；球面支承；球形支座
球面滚子轴承；球形滚柱轴承

trans.tran_cn: 球形的，球面的，天体的，天空的
trans.tran_en: having the shape of a sphere
